title: Why Is Everyone in San Francisco Freaking out about a Protected Bike Lane?
content:
You’ve seen bike lanes. You’ve seen painted lanes that don’t work quite as planned. You’ve seen separated bike lanes that place people independent of car traffic. But have you seen a bike lane that places riders right in the middle of traffic? Meet Valencia Street, and guess what? Even though it looks like businesses hate … Continued

Read the full article at Why Is Everyone in San Francisco Freaking out about a Protected Bike Lane? on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
